overview_of_class: This course introduces questions and recent empirical research in the economics of education. Topics include the returns to schooling, the individual decision to invest in education, the effect of education on economic and social outcomes, the production of education, the markets for schools and teachers, and public policies related to education.
name: Economics of Education
title: WCAS ECON 341-0-20 Economics of Education

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course introduces questions and recent empirical research in the economics of education. Topics include the returns to schooling, the individual decision to invest in education, the effect of education on economic and social outcomes, the production of education, the markets for schools and teachers, and public policies related to education.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Your grade will be based on tests, written paper, and class participation.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value:
Notes that will be provided.
Optional reference: Labor Economics, George J Borjas, any edition is fine. The latest edition (7th) ISBN is: 978-0078021886.

subject: ECON
